tierlistpve.name: Tier List - PvE
tierlistpve.description: Complete ranking of all characters in Outerplane for PVE content, based on evaluations with 6-star transcends and level 0 Exclusive Equipment effects.

tierlistpvp.name: Tier List - PvP
tierlistpvp.description: Complete ranking of all characters in Outerplane for PvP content, based on evaluations with 6-star transcends and level 0 Exclusive Equipment effects.

ee-priority.name: Exclusive Equipment Priority
ee-priority.description: A ranking of exclusive equipment (EE) based on their usefulness and impact at level 0. +10 effects are not considered.

gear-usage-stats.name: Gear Usage Statistics
gear-usage-stats.description: Discover the most recommended weapons, amulets and sets in Outerplane builds.

gear-solver.name: Gear Usage Finder
gear-solver.description: Unsure which character can use your gear? This tool helps you find the best match based on equipment.

patch-history.name: Patch Notes & Dev Notes
patch-history.description: Browse all Outerplane patch notes, developer notes, hero compendium and more.

coupons.name: Coupon Codes
coupons.description: Get all valid, expired, and upcoming promo codes for Outerplane. Updated regularly on Outerpedia.

pull-sim.name: Pull Simulator
pull-sim.description: Simulate gacha pulls for all Outerplane banners. Test your luck on Rate Up, Premium, and Limited banners with mileage system included.
